div.p: [Julius Serenus, collector of money taxes at Elephantine, and] Apollonios [son of Amonios and Valerion son of] Memerk( ) who are nominated [to the collectorship in place of Harpchemis. Pa]premethis son of Pachnoubis, [his mother being NN has paid] for the contributions of the 18th year, for the [military station around the palm yard which was call]ed Sandantes, [fourteen drachmas, 1/2 obol, 2 chalkoi] Year 19, [month, day. 2nd hand I, Julius Serenus,] have received together (with my colleagues). Translation with slight modifications: Aly, ZPE 212 (2019) 220
